verses.verse: Then <WG2532> was Jesus <WG4260> led up <WG1564> of the <WG1492> Spirit <WG1417> into <WG243> the <WG80> wilderness <WG2385> to be tempted of <WG2199> the <WG2532> devil <WG2491>.
And <WG2532> when he had fasted <WG3522> forty <WG5062> days <WG2250> and <WG2532> forty <WG5062> nights <WG3571>, he <WG3983> afterward <WG5305> hungered <WG3983>.

And <WG2532> the tempter <WG3985> came <WG4334> and said <WG2036> unto him <WG846>, If <WG1487> thou art <WG1488> the Son <WG5207> of God <WG2316>, command <WG2036> that <WG2443> these <WG3778> stones <WG3037> become <WG1096> bread <WG740>.

But <WG1161> he answered <WG611> and said <WG2036>, It is written <WG1125>, Man <WG444> shall <WG2198> not <WG3756> live <WG2198> by <WG1909> bread <WG740> alone <WG3441>, but <WG235> by <WG1909> every <WG3956> word <WG4487> that proceedeth <WG1607> out <WG1223> of the mouth <WG4750> of God <WG2316>.

Then <WG5119> the devil <WG1228> taketh <WG3880> him <WG846> into <WG1519> the <WG3880> holy <WG40> city <WG4172>; and <WG2532> he set <WG2476> him <WG846> on <WG1909> the pinnacle <WG4419> of the temple <WG2411>,

and <WG2532> saith <WG3004> unto him <WG846>, If <WG1487> thou art <WG1488> the Son <WG5207> of God <WG2316>, cast <WG906> thyself <WG4572> down <WG2736>: for <WG1063> it is written <WG3754>, He shall give <WG1781> his <WG846> angels <WG32> charge <WG1781> concerning <WG4012> thee <WG4675>: and <WG2532>, On <WG1909> their hands <WG5495> they shall bear <WG142> thee <WG4571> up <WG142>, lest haply <WG3379> thou dash <WG4350> thy <WG4675> foot <WG4228> against <WG4314> a stone <WG3037>.
Jesus <WG2424> said <WG5346> unto him <WG846>, Again <WG3825> it is written <WG1125>, Thou shalt <WG1598> not <WG3756> make trial <WG1598> of the Lord <WG2962> thy <WG4675> God <WG2316>.

Again <WG3825>, the devil <WG1228> taketh <WG3880> him <WG846> unto <WG1519> an <WG3880> exceeding <WG3029> high <WG5308> mountain <WG3735>, and <WG2532> showeth <WG1166> him <WG846> all <WG3956> the kingdoms <WG932> of the world <WG2889>, and <WG2532> the glory <WG1391> of them <WG846>;
and <WG2532> he said <WG3004> unto him <WG846>, All <WG3956> these things <WG5023> will I give <WG1325> thee <WG4671>, if <WG1437> thou wilt fall down <WG4098> and worship <WG4352> me <WG3427>.

Then <WG5119> saith Jesus <WG2424> unto him <WG846>, Get <WG3004> thee <WG3004> hence <WG4567>, Satan: for <WG1063> it is written <WG1125>, Thou shalt worship <WG4352> the Lord <WG2962> thy <WG4675> God <WG2316>, and <WG2532> him <WG846> only <WG3441> shalt thou serve <WG3000>.
Then <WG5119> the devil <WG1228> leaveth <WG863> him <WG846>; and <WG2532> behold <WG2400>, angels <WG32> came <WG4334> and <WG2532> ministered <WG1247> unto him <WG846>.
Now <WG1161> when he <WG2424> heard <WG191> that <WG3754> John <WG2491> was delivered <WG3860> up <WG402>, he withdrew into <WG1519> Galilee <WG1056>;

and <WG2532> leaving <WG2641> Nazareth <WG3478>, he came <WG2064> and dwelt <WG2730> in <WG1519> Capernaum <WG2584>, which <WG3588> is by the sea <WG3864>, in <WG1722> the borders <WG3725> of Zebulun <WG2194> and <WG2532> Naphtali <WG3508>:
that <WG2443> it might be fulfilled <WG4137> which <WG3588> was spoken <WG4483> through <WG1223> Isaiah <WG2268> the prophet <WG4396>, saying <WG3004>,

The land <WG1093> of Zebulun <WG2194> and <WG2532> the land <WG1093> of Naphtali <WG3508>, Toward <WG3598> the sea <WG2281>, beyond <WG4008> the Jordan <WG2446>, Galilee <WG1056> of the Gentiles <WG1093>,

the people <WG2992> that <WG3588> sat <WG2521> in <WG1722> darkness <WG4655> saw <WG1492> a great <WG3173> light <WG5457>, and <WG2532> to them <WG846> that <WG3588> sat <WG2521> in <WG1722> the region <WG5561> and <WG2532> shadow <WG4639> of death <WG2288>, to them did light <WG5457> spring up <WG393>.

From <WG575> that time <WG5119> began <WG756> Jesus <WG2424> to preach <WG2784>, and <WG2532> to say <WG3004>, Repent <WG3340> ye <WG1063>; for the kingdom <WG932> of heaven <WG3772> is at hand <WG1448>.

And <WG1161> walking <WG4043> by <WG3844> the sea <WG2281> of Galilee <WG1056>, he <WG2424> saw <WG1492> two <WG1417> brethren <WG80>, Simon <WG4613> who is called <WG3004> Peter <WG4074>, and <WG2532> Andrew <WG406> his <WG846> brother <WG80>, casting <WG906> a net <WG293> into <WG1519> the sea <WG2281>; for <WG1063> they were <WG2258> fishers <WG231>.
And <WG2532> he saith <WG3004> unto them <WG846>, Come <WG1205> ye <WG3694> after me <WG3450>, and <WG2532> I <WG3694> will make <WG4160> you <WG5209> fishers <WG231> of men <WG444>.
And <WG1161> they <WG863> straightway <WG2112> left <WG863> the nets <WG1350>, and followed <WG190> him <WG846>.

And <WG2532> going on <WG4260> from thence <WG1564> he saw <WG1492> two <WG1417> other <WG243> brethren <WG80>, James <WG2385> the son of Zebedee <WG2199>, and <WG2532> John <WG2491> his <WG846> brother <WG80>, in <WG1722> the boat <WG4143> with <WG3326> Zebedee <WG2199> their <WG846> father <WG3962>, mending <WG2675> their <WG846> nets <WG1350>; and <WG2532> he called <WG2564> them <WG846>.
And <WG1161> they straightway <WG2112> left <WG863> the boat <WG4143> and <WG2532> their <WG846> father <WG3962>, and followed <WG190> him <WG846>.

And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> went about <WG4013> in all <WG3650> Galilee <WG1056>, teaching <WG1321> in <WG1722> their <WG846> synagogues <WG4864>, and <WG2532> preaching <WG2784> the gospel <WG2098> of the kingdom <WG932>, and <WG2532> healing <WG2323> all manner of <WG3956> disease <WG3119> and <WG2532> all manner of <WG3956> sickness <WG3554> among <WG1722> the people <WG2992>.

And <WG2532> the report <WG189> of him <WG846> went <WG565> forth <WG1519> into all <WG3956> Syria <WG4947>: and <WG2532> they brought <WG4374> unto him <WG846> all <WG3956> that <WG2192> were sick <WG2560>, holden <WG4912> with divers <WG4164> diseases <WG3554> and <WG2532> torments <WG931>, possessed with demons <WG1139>, and <WG2532> epileptic <WG4583>, and <WG2532> palsied <WG3885>; and <WG2532> he healed <WG2323> them <WG846>.

And <WG2532> there followed <WG190> him <WG846> great multitudes <WG4183> from <WG575> Galilee <WG1056> and <WG2532> Decapolis <WG1179> and <WG2532> Jerusalem <WG2414> and <WG2532> Judaea and <WG2532> from beyond <WG4008> the Jordan <WG2446>.
